name: part_008
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】豪華ゲスト & 生演奏 & 告知あり！ #博衣こより生誕Live2025 -FIRST STEP- 【博衣こより⧸ホロライブ】 [ERIxQaoEbXs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs the song 'Tear-Gazer' solo on a 3D stage.
A loading intermission where Hakui Koyori poses and dances to BGM.
Hakui Koyori and guest Ookami Mio perform a duet of 'Mizutamari' accompanied by a pianist.

subtitles.original: …は 君の前で
subtitles.english: ...before you,

subtitles.original: 笑ってみせる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a smile.

subtitles.original: 強がりの僕らだけど
subtitles.english: Though we both try to act tough,

subtitles.original: 毛布の中一人で
subtitles.english: Alone under the blankets,

subtitles.original: 涙流す日もある
subtitles.english: There are days when we shed tears.

subtitles.original: 孤独の旋律さ
subtitles.english: It's a melody of loneliness.

subtitles.original: 自分に正直な
subtitles.english: Being honest with myself,

subtitles.original: やりたいにまっすぐな
subtitles.english: Following my desires directly,

subtitles.original: 君だけのヒーローで ありたい
subtitles.english: I want to be your very own hero.

subtitles.original: 悔しさを重ねて
subtitles.english: Accumulating my regrets,

subtitles.original: 駆け上がっていこうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's run up to the top!

subtitles.original: 今はまだ未知の途中
subtitles.english: We're still in the middle of the unknown.

subtitles.original: きっと...
subtitles.english: Surely...

subtitles.original: 絶対諦めない！
subtitles.english: I'll never give up!

subtitles.original: 精一杯 精一杯 まだまだ明日を目指して
subtitles.english: With all my might, I'll aim for tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 全力で Do it madamada 夢の向こうへ
subtitles.english: Go all out and do it, further beyond the dream.

subtitles.original: No way どんな難題でも 最高潮ではじき返せ
subtitles.english: No way, no matter the challenge, bounce it back at the peak!

subtitles.original: へこたれたって最後まで 全心 全速 3, 2, 1, Define high!
subtitles.english: Even if I stumble, I'll go to the end, heart and soul, full speed, 3, 2, 1, Define high!

subtitles.original: Run water! どこまでも 僕たちは諦めないからさ
subtitles.english: Run water! Everywhere, we'll never give up!

subtitles.original: 涙 越えていこう ほら、ほら、ほら、今、今、3, 2, 1, Go!
subtitles.english: Let's go beyond the tears, look, look, look, now, now, 3, 2, 1, Go!

subtitles.original: 僕だけじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not just me.

subtitles.original: 君だけじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not just you.

subtitles.original: 悔しくて嫌いになった
subtitles.english: I grew to hate it out of frustration.

subtitles.original: 消えてしまいたいと思った
subtitles.english: I wanted to just disappear.

subtitles.original: だから聞こえないように叫ぶ歌
subtitles.english: So this song is a scream so no one hears.

subtitles.original: 水たまりに吐き捨ててた 声
subtitles.english: A voice spat out into a puddle.

subtitles.original:
水たまり
作詞・作曲 Carlos.K
subtitles.english:
Mizutamari
Lyrics & Composition by Carlos.K

subtitles.original: この感情は何なんだろう 素直に受け入れられないよ
subtitles.english: What is this feeling? I can't accept it honestly.

subtitles.original: 息もできないほどに押しつぶされてく
subtitles.english: I'm being crushed until I can't breathe.

subtitles.original: あぁ 誰かの眩しさに焦って 待ってなんて言いづらいなんて
subtitles.english: Ah, feeling rushed by someone's radiance, finding it hard to say 'Wait'...

subtitles.original: 唇を噛み締めた
subtitles.english: I bit my lip.

subtitles.original: 乾いた心に
subtitles.english: In my parched heart,

subtitles.original: 降る雨 想いが溜まる
subtitles.english: The falling rain makes my feelings pool.

subtitles.original: 水面（みなも）に映った
subtitles.english: Reflected on the water's surface,

subtitles.original: この顔は嘘つきだ
subtitles.english: This face is a liar's.

subtitles.original: 聞いて！
subtitles.english: Listen!

subtitles.original: 嫌いじゃない 嫌いじゃない でも
subtitles.english: I don't hate it, I don't hate it, but...

subtitles.original: 嫌いじゃない 嫌いじゃないでしょ？
subtitles.english: You don't hate it, you don't hate it, right?

subtitles.original: まっすぐに不器用でもいい
subtitles.english: It's fine to be direct, even if awkward.

subtitles.original: どうでもいい どうでもいいんだよ
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter, it doesn't matter at all.

subtitles.original: 君を隠すどんな雨も 水たまり踏みつけて
subtitles.english: Stomp on the puddles of any rain that tries to hide you.
